description:
go.tools/go/types: remove defers from critical paths

Various minor cleanups.

messages.text:
Hello adonovan@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/10925043/diff/8001/go/types/errors.go
File go/types/errors.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10925043/diff/8001/go/types/errors.go#newcode52
go/types/errors.go:52: const dots = ".  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  "
Is performance that important for this debugging code?  If not, use
string.Repeat(".  ", n).

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1d8af45646d8&repo=tools ***

go.tools/go/types: remove defers from critical paths

Various minor cleanups.

R=adonovan
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10925043

https://codereview.appspot.com/10925043/diff/8001/go/types/errors.go

On 2013/07/04 01:59:59, adonovan wrote:
> Is performance that important for this debugging code?  If not, use
> string.Repeat(".  ", n).

Done.

subject: code review 10925043: go.tools/go/types: remove defers from critical paths
